thread.title: Jury in Percoco Trial Deadlocked Again, But Judge Orders More Deliberation

author: Erica Orden
title: Jury in Percoco Trial Deadlocked Again, But Judge Orders More Deliberation
text:
After jurors in the federal corruption trial of a former aide to New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo declared for a second time they were deadlocked Monday, raising the prospect of a mistrial, the judge overseeing the case ordered them to continue deliberating.
The 12-person jury in the case of the former aide, Joseph Percoco, said in a note to the judge on Monday morning in federal court in Manhattan that they couldnâ€™t reach a unanimous verdict in the trial.
